content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on deck facing south, i looked up & all the sudden it was there. it was so bright & no sound. i thought it was odd because helicopters fly over all the time. this was a little higher than treetop level over the lake here. i took a lot of pics & the actual size & brightness didn't show up which we thought was really weird. it didn't move fast at all. we went to outside of garage to watch it head off to the east & at that time a plane was in the far distance. someone else reported this on telegraph rd.In the pics has more of boomerang shape.
content.summary: I was siting on deck looked up it was coming towards me, i took picks, but did not show actually size or brightness. changed direction to the west & we didn't know what it was , but no sound. i seen someone else posted so i thought i would

content.detailedDescription: As i stepped unto my doorstep i noticed an unusual bright light at 25 degrees ne.  it was moving across the sky about the same speed as a satelite however it continually pulsated from nearly blinking out to a very bright light and moved towards the nw.  as it moved straight about me i lost sight of it.  i mentioned the sighting to stan friedman who said it didn't appear to be a satelite and he had no idea what it was.  it was not the iss as it was not in the same orbit.
content.summary: Starlike pulsating bright light

content.detailedDescription: Traveling south on telegraph road @ 1045pm june 2nd. notice object slow in the sky just off to the west. oval with 8 strobe lights forming the outline. pulled off the road and observed the object hovering from less than 500 feet and it was silent. after about 1 minute the oject started north right over telegragh road with an altitude of around 500 feet. followd in mt car but object increased speed and lost sight at 255 and telegragh road.
content.summary: Slow moving, silent, in populated area, moved off slowly after hovering, had to have been more witnesses

content.detailedDescription: Ufos chased by fighter jets aspirated to be shot at but juked and moved out of planes attack faster then jets by 1000%
content.summary: Made mathematical movements in group chard by fighter planes out of dmab

content.detailedDescription:
As i was driving home from work around 10:30 at night i saw what i thought was a helicopter light off in the distance. but it seemed to stay in the same place that is why i thought it was a helicopter, when i got in my driveway it was still in the same spot, i saw another light also and thought to myself that looked like a close call in the sky, and just thought it was a helicopter searching for someone, i remember coming in the house and telling my family about it and saying, well if the police are looking for someone i hope they are not headed our way. and didn't think anymore about it.We went to bed and sometime during the night i was awoken by a bright light in my room and thought wow that is one bright light, to light up my room, it was so bright i could see all of the furniture in the room, and my bedroom door was closed. its always open. i think i closed my eyes and the next thing i opened them and was in some kind of room it seemed almost like a circular hallway with very dim lighting, no one was there and i was on some type of bed. i could not see anyone, but i could hear them, i think at least two voices, one said we cannot use this specimen or person i am not sure of the wording now. but they said she has been altered or changed she cannot have or carry a child. (i have had a tubal ligation so that was true) i don't remember much of anything else except one voice said no lets send her back. the next thing i remember is being in my bed in total darkness, i have a clock radio but could not see it, was like a presence was standing between me and the light on my radio and a voice seemed to be reassuring me that i would be ok i could only move my head and then i opened my eyes again and my room was lit up again with my door back open, i could see my husband in the bed beside me. it sorta sounded like a helicopter going off in the distance and the bright light was gone. i asked my family the next morning if they had heard a helicopter and no one had. so i told them what i had heard during the night. i am not sure of the date because it has been a few years.
i have often thought of being hypnotized to see if i can remember anymore details.  it just seemed so strange and still does.
content.summary: Abduction

content.detailedDescription: Not now
content.summary: No

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 9:30 p.M. central time and i was walking towards my front door when out of the corner of my left eye i saw what looked like an orange-red glowing and pulsating orb. i couldn't believe  what i was seeing. i stopped abruptly to look at it and as i did it seemed as though it slowed down as if it had seen my sudden movement. i got a little scared when it did that, so i decided to hurry into my house to get my camera. it took less than 30 seconds to get the camera, but when i came back out to take a picture of it, the orb had traveled a couple of miles to the north and was too far to get a picture. it continued to travel and as it got further away it seemed to go down below tree level when i lost sight of it.
content.summary: I saw an orange an red glowing orb. it looked like a "small sun".  flying low above tree lines heading in a northern direction.

content.detailedDescription: Out on the usual night hike in to some nearby blm land for star gazing my friend and i noticed a bright light pass just above us, it dimmed out briefly just a one time.  we thought nothing of it, at first i thought it was a bright satellite.  using his smartphone my friend used an app to see if it was the space station or some other satellite.  it was not, and then it went through the clouds and we could see beams of light emitting in all directions on and through the clouds also casting shadows in the clouds.  it was obvious me us then that it was not that high in elevation. it was moving quite fast.  much faster than the planes around it.  we then stopped to observe a jetliner flying south east on the other side of the sky at the same elevation as the clouds to compare the two.  they were nothing a like. we definitely heard the jetliner, we could easily make out the multitude of aircraft lights, the bright light traveling ne was one bright white light and made no sound.
content.summary: Bright white light move north east away from us

content.detailedDescription: My son stepped outside at around 10:00 pm. he came inside and told me and my wife to look outside. to the east of fort atkinson we could see orange flashing lights in the sky. at times blue and red beams seemed to shoot through the trees. it looked as if kids were playing with laser pointers in the distance. we wanted to get a closer look at the lights so my son and i drove to purdy school parking lot. the street lights in the area were flickering when we saw the light in the sky. we then followed the light east to hommersons pond where we sat and watched for about 5 min. orange flashing lights seemed to be behind the tree line so we drove again to get a better look. we drove about 5 - 8 miles down 106 east and pulled over to the side of the road. we now had a great view of a large orange ball of light behind a cloud. it was a clear sky but the strange lights always had a cloud around them. when it lit up, the whole horizon was orange. we saw a large white light that looked like it was getting closer to us in the sky. we both now were scared and turned around to go home. i found myself almost unable to stop looking in my rear & side mirrors. when we passed purdy school on the way home we noticed that the street lights where back to normal. when my son and i got back home we told my wife what we had seen. i heard about mufon and decided i should report what we saw.
content.summary: Myself , my son , & my wife saw strange lights in the horizon. my son and i got in my car to drive closer to the lights. and what we saw we will never forget.

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting on my porch at around 10:20pm i was observing an airplane in the sky. i was facing and looking north and the plane was traveling south west. suddenly from the west, right over my house an unusually bright object appeared almost directly over my house traveling north east. while keeping my eyes on the object i hollered for my oldest son to come look, at which time he and my youngest came out and observed the object as well. when they came out the object was still barley moving and still pretty much overhead. after about 20 seconds the object sped up considerably while gaining altitude.  i was still sitting and and the object appeared to me to gain altitude until it faded while ascending at a considerable angle. my 17yr old who was standing said it appeared to him to just blink out and was gone. we both lost site at around what appeared to be at the altitude of the stars in our view.

there where no blinking lights. the object was a really clean white solid light. to contrast i pointed out the airplane to my kids to show the difference. the altitude when first seen started lower than commercial or military planes fly and once it started ascending, it did so faster than any commercial or military plane i have ever seen. aside from the strangely clean looking solid white light, the slowness it was moving while level then the sudden incline and speed was really unusual. there was absolutely no sound.
content.summary: Solid unwavering, unusually bright white light heading north east

content.detailedDescription: On june 2, 2014, at approximately 21:30hrs in the city of oneida, i was outside on my back deck smoking a cigarette.  i looked up at the sky as i always do, and noticed a bright yellowish- orange orb flying in a north eastern direction.  i estimated the orbs height to be 200-300ft above the trees in my area (which are approx 75-100ft high).  the orb continued in a straight line, and did not move up or down or side to side  i used my video recorder on my iphone, and i was able to take 2 short videos of the orb, before it was out of view.  during the time that i was observing the orb, the sky was blanketed with clouds with a slight wind, but no stars were visible.  this orb was the only bright object in the sky.  the orb did not make any noise and was a solid steady color, however after i reviewed the video, i was able to see the orb, but the orb does appear to flicker in the video, and i am not sure if my iphone was just having a difficult time focusing in on the orb.
content.summary: Yellow-orange ball of light silently flying ne direction

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Was at home at 495 b street in beaumont california had just woke up had slept all day so was wide awake it all started around 11:00 pm i want to say i'm not too sure though a friend came by to have a ciggerate after she got off of work when she did there was a bright light in the sky that looked like a star was the biggest star in the sky at least it seemed it moved more then anything else in the sky but very gradually after i pointed it out to a friend and observing it we noticed more and more how what we thought were stars started to move around in formation after being in awe more and more things started to happen the first thing was all the dogs in the small neighborhood started barking and the coyotes in the distance started howling for about 20 to 30 seconds and at the same time they all stopped we were a little freaked out by time then it was complete silence about 10 to 15 minutes later birds from the west side off us no telling where they came from all took off in fright above us headed east hundreds of them it seemed the silence happen again then car alarms all through out the neighborhood went off at the same time for about 10 seconds then at the same time they all went off then again silence no crickets no sound at all about a half hour later these things that actually looked like stars started coming down to the horizon and passing through the sky with no sound eventually close to everything we thought were stars started to move and form triangle formations it was exciting but at the same time scary i wanted to call the police are the fire department to report it but at the same time was amused and appreciative of what i was experiencing not only that it was so crazy that i figured would let someone else do it not to long after that i seen one of the objects from a good distance coming closer the way it moved was like nothing else it did not move in a straight line it would be in one spot then appear in another i ran out around my drive way to the street and this craft was floated over me with no sound i honestly can't remember me even hearing my breath it was so close i could probably hit it with a rock......... well i've always wanted to get this out there and it does feel like a little bit of a relief i tried to tell my closes friends and i've been ridiculed so i haven't been able to share this with anyone but who i experienced it with i really appreciate what you members of mufon are doing and i'm willing to take a liar detecter test if you guys want i wish i had took a picture i had a phone on me but i was in awe it is something i wish i have done i really hope i hear from you guys i honestly don't feel comfortable talking about this to anyone else.......
content.summary: I really wish i could i'm sorry

content.detailedDescription: I had just returned home from a chemistry class around 10:30 pm.I looked up at the stars because we have very little light pollution where i live. i observed an object flashing red and white. it looked like a star except the longer i looked, i observed it move very quickly then stand still like a star. at first, i thought it was a weather balloon but weather balloons don't move like that. i looked around and i saw at least 3 more to the west. after about an hour of hovering then moving slightly very quickly, the object to the south appeared to fire two projectiles first from the left side then about a second later from the right. after about 2-3 seconds i heard an explosion from the left and then from the right. the projectiles resembled shooting stars except that they traveled in an arc. my friend and mother were both inside the house and i brought the event to there attention. they both told me to get inside out of fear, however; i stated that "this is a once in a lifetime experience" and i elected to stay outside. i observed the objects for about two hours before i decided to go to sleep. the objects appeared off and on for about the next week. i was leaving a parking lot very close to my home about a week later and observed a similar object much closer to the ground(about tree top level) it was glowing red only and at arms length appeared to be about the size of a baseball. the object vanished after that and i haven't seen any since. i attempted to take photos and video on 7/12/13 but all i got was black.
content.summary: Multiple objects,flashing red/white, appeared to fire two projectiles in an arc in two different directions heard one explosions from both directions seen off and on for about a week. observed closer view appeared to be at tree level

content.detailedDescription: The 1st of june i went to take a nap with my girlfriend,in a half dream state i dreamt i reached out out side the atmosphere extending a greetings to what was out there.When we woke up the cable  was scrambled on the tv,my phone was scrambled,we had to reboot both. that night i pictured a blue light coming from my head i stared at a star,and asked to see a sign that they were near,next thing i know it was blinking randomly ,far away near the path of the star i focused on in the video.If you watch it its hard to see,but theres random blinks all near the star.
content.summary: I saw a guy try to summon on youtube,so i filled myself with happiness,and and them to come.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my truck out back of my restaurant going through figures when i heard an unusually loud helicopter noise approaching from the south. i exited my vehicle and tuened south, towards the noise to see a helicopter flying about 150-200ft altitude coming just about over my position. it was moving south to north and passed roughly 100 yards to the west of me. as it got closer i noticed what appeared to be a star out in front and a little left of the helicopter. they were moving at identical speed and the "star" looked to be roughly 1 1/2 lengths of the helicopter away from the helicopter. the helicopter was black or dark in color in the night sky so the body was not visible; however, based on the lights & noise coming from it, it was easy to estimate the size and distance. the star was difficult to see due to the lighting in the parking lot and it appeared to be faint nonetheless. when it registered to me that the helicopter was chasing something i ran into the building as it passed nearly over and yelled for the staff to follow me out front hoping for others to witness this strange event. by the time i got the front door open and we ran out the helicopter was at a distance and position that prevented anyone else from seeing the object it was chasing. this is the 2nd time i witnessed a star like object being followed by terrestrial aircraft in this town. the first time was roughly 4 miles due east of this location approximately 1 1/2 years ago. i thought what i saw was weird then and talked myself into believing my eyes were tricking me. but after seeing this a 2nd time, i am sure something star he is happening now.
content.summary: Helicopter chasing star

content.detailedDescription: I was on the was to my in laws house after work around 11:30pm. i was traveling outbound on 376 toward carnegie when my radio cut out completly. i found this unusual because at the time i was listening to tunein radio which is an app on my iphone and i had already lost and regained signal after i went thru the tunnel. so i looked down at my phone and it said buffering 3% so i waited and it never went past 3%. i went to put light a cigarette and as i looked up i noticed the light. there is an airport in the area so i thought nothing of it at first. as i continued to look at it i began to notice that at no point did the craft blink like a plane or helicopter. as time went on it seemed to slow almost to a stop a few times then continue on its path. the object looked to be a large triangle with 3 lights on the back and 2 lights on the side visible to me. the glow/blurr of the lights made it hard to even notice much of a surface but i believe it was a solid object not just lights in the sky. after a few minutes of it in the distance it started to disappear to my left and as i followed it out of view with my eyes i noticed the car in the left lane next to me was watching it too. we made short eye contact and he looked as confused as me about 15 seconds later the radio on my phone came back on which as right before the heidelburg exit. i am very familiar with aircraft military, commercial, and private and this is nothing i have ever seen before. if i had to compare it to an aircraft i am familiar with it would be the boeing x-45c drone. it was very similar in shape the light pattern was different and the drone does not have the ability to hover.
content.summary: Triangle shaped craft with 3 bright lights on back and 2 on side visible moving very slow appearing to stop and go a few times then continue on path with no sound

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of january 26th, i took photos of the sunset sky, as i often do.  upon reviewing this particular set of photos, i was surprised to find this mysterious object had apparently appeared from the northwest sky, darting about, coming closer, darting about again, to finally disappear into the southwest sky.  the object in the photos seems to be a solid rectangular mass.  i also noticed there appears to be three large lights in the southwest sky that are mostly hidden in the clouds.  the solid rectangular object had finally disappeared into the area of the three large lights in the clouds.  i felt quite astonished and a bit frightened when i discovered the incident in my photos.
content.summary: While going through photos i took of the sunset sky, i noticed the strange object in each photo.

content.detailedDescription: 10-13 orbs of light all sat still in the sky. the majority vanished in thin air and 3 remained in a (sideways acute) triangular shape 1 red and 2 white. completely stationary until a jet-plane passed below them and they all vanished. these lights were far above the clouds. we stood there looking at them for about 15 minutes, the duration of the time they seemed to come in and out of visibility, yet remained in the same place. pictures were taken but they didn't show up due to them being too far away.
content.summary: 10-13 orbs of light stationary in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Friend was working at event where he took a selfie and he accidently captured a fleet of ufos streaking by possibly at light speed unseen by the human eye.
content.summary: Friend taking selfie caught pic of supersonic ufos...

content.detailedDescription:
My fianc�� and i were relaxing in the hot tub.  about 5 minutes after we sat down in the water we were talking and out of no where with no warning a very bright beam of light hit the trees about 5 feet behind us and about 10 to 15 feet directly above us.  i could see the light beam coming across the roof line of the house, but, all i could see was the beam from the peak of the house to the end of the beam of light, it was about as big around as a basket ball and it seemed to be focusing on the trees.  the light went left and right about 4 feet in either direction and then went up the tree about 3 to 5 feet and then disappeared as quickly as it appeared.  my fianc�� could see the more of the beam because she was sitting facing the back of her house, and she said to me that the light beam seemed to go on for miles, but could not see where it started.  there was no noise at all not even frogs or crickets or ambient noise.  there was no way anyone could have used a light from street level as  we are on the top of a hill, and the direction from where the light was coming was lower then the level of ground we were on.

the whole incident lasted maybe 30 seconds.
content.summary: A long very bright beam of light

content.detailedDescription: I wanna start by saying, i was never into ufo's or aliens..I never bought into the whole subject, but something's have changed my mind. these are the things. it was in the middle of january of this year ( 2014 ) a week day, and i was sitting in my living room watching television..Come to think of it,. it must of been a friday, the only reason i say that is because it's my husband's day off and he was home at the time. well i was in my living room watching tv when all the sudden i became very tired..Like i haven't slept. i got up and went in to my bedroom to lay down. now it's after 12 pm in the afternoon, and i remember that a certain talk show was on. i climbed in to bed next to my husband, and and closed my eyes..It didn't take long where i was so tired unexpectedly. when i closed my eyes i seen the normal black, but then there was this small circle of electric blue and white light that grew larger..It looked almost like electric lightning. i could still hear the tv and feel my husband, but i couldn't move. all of the sudden the electric circle was gone and i was walking through someone's backyard ( i've never been there before ) and i can remember every detail of it too. i felt confused, but confident in where i was going, but wasn't sure why or who's house this was. as i walked through the backyard i noticed it was dat time as well and i could see an above ground pool with a maroon tarp on it..That stood out to me because i never seen a maroon pool cover..Only blue. the backdoor was 2 sliding glass doors..I opened the door and walked into a kitchen and i walked through the kitchen in to the living room. the front door was ahead to the left straight, the couch and chair was to the right and looked like a fireplace too..The main windows were behind the couch straight ahead. i noticed a staircase to the second floor..Now while i'm goin through this i can feel my husband move around and hear the tv still ,but still can't move or talk. the stairs had about 4 steps before you got to the main staircase..This was also weird..I've never seen this before..Well i took the 4 steps and as i was about to ascend the staircase i heard this loud..Awful..Humming..Buzzing sound..My ears couldn't stand it. then suddenly i was gone. the noise stopped and i was in this dark room..All i could see were 2 aliens standing in front of me about 10 feet. i knew they wanted me to walk over to them, and in between them was a ..What looked like to me..A 50" flat screen television. i wasn't afraid to be near them..I was curious,and confused. as i walked over to them i had an urge to go to the black square in between them. remind you they never once talked to me and i never opened my mouth..(i can still hear my television in my room going) as i got closer to the square i realized it was a window and they were showing me an ariel view of the place i was just in. i asked with my thoughts..What is this? why they showing me this? then all the sudden i seen the electric blue and white lightning circle again...I couldn't move..Tell..Open my eyes. the circle disappeared and within 40 seconds i opened my eye's feeling exhausted. i looked around freaked out..Not knowing what to think. i had told my husband what happened, and he said he had to tell me something. he said a week before that he had woken up after 2 am and there was a white beam of light shining in but from above..So you could tell it was coming from above the house. he was too scared to move, but he said it disappeared in less then a minute. he wouldn't get out of bed and didn't wanna tell me because he thought i'd think he was crazy. me and my husband never believed in this stuff..My dad was always a believer..I use to tell him he was crazy and now i'm not so sure.
content.summary: Confusing..Never experienced this. telepathic abduction is all i can think of.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on the balcony of my house with my girlfriend looking out at the stars when in the eastern sky above mt. cheam an object just appeared out of no where.  it started out just hovering in the sky.  it was a small object that appeared to be on fire, but it was making no noise and was just hovering.  then all of a sudden, it shot straight up, then shot straight down to its approximate original height, then it shot south, and came back then right back to its approximate original spot in the sky,  it then shot diagonally up and south and then as quick as it appeared, the light was gone.

the night was a clear night, we didn't notice any other objects in the sky in the immediate area at the time the object appeared.

the object just looked like a straight object kind of, that was on fire.

after the object disappeared, we looked to the left of where we saw it, and we noticed farther off that there were lights from a plane, and we could hear the jet engines, but it was several kilometers away from where we saw the object.
content.summary: Glowing firel like object

content.detailedDescription: The day i saw the ufo it was about 7:00 i was riding the veloway in austin, texas i parked my bike on a tree to fix the bike chain. i look up and notice baseball shaped lights. it does this for about 20 seconds. then the ufo moves to the left and the last light of day catches the bottom and shows a black metal. then with no sound it disappears with a flash. the whole time their was no sound. i have seen some black jets fly by before but they were from camp mabry and they don't hover.
content.summary: It had a bright beams  comeing out of the boosters and a pitch black surface. then when it took off it had a 3d shape.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at mounds park mn with my 4 yr. old son taking photos of the sun when the object appeared in the lens. i wasn't thinking clearly when i seen it because i was awe struck and wanted to watch it, i only captured one shot of the ufo...
the picture that i captured of it doesn't do it justice to what it actually looked like, it was so much brighter than what the picture makes it out to be.
the way that it entered the lens area coming out from the sun and the speed of it is what caught me off guard. it was when the object made the swift turn going back and then up is when i thought omg i better get this on film or no one will believe me so i hurried up and took the photo. i then tried to get my video going before it disappeared but didn't get it going in time, hence the reason i only got one photo of it...
the object appeared in my lens so i pulled my phone camera from in front of my face to see it with my eyes and not through the phone... it was moving so fast coming out from the sun, it then paused for less then a second and went back the direction toward the sun but instead of it going that exact path it went up diagonally and then it was gone. i believe that i lost sight because of the distance or maybe it even blinked out, it was traveling up and looked as it may have been leaving our atmosphere, but it just disappeared right before our very eyes.
my son is still talking about it and tells everyone that we meet that he saw a ufo, he was very excited to have seen it but acts as if this is the norm to see such things... he even told me that "mommy, that's where my other daddy is"... 
the conversations with my son after this happened are almost like he already knows about them and seems a bit confused that i made such a big fuss about it. his excitement seemed to be more a validation of his "other daddy" being out there where the "fireballs" are, he says.
this is the second time that i have seen what i consider to be a ufo, the first time i was a young child around the age of 8 when i had seen a diamond shape ufo, tried getting my grandmother's attention to look up, she wouldn't or couldn't because she was driving, so i told her what i had seen, she then recited the nursery rhyme "twinkle twinkle little star" to me, pretty much blowing it off that way.
writing this something just dawned on me: twinkle twinkle little star how i wonder "what" you are, up above the world so high, like a diamond in the sky!!! was the nursery rhyme trying to tell us something???
content.summary: It seemed to have come from in front of the sun, went down a little then turned completely around to go back toward the sun then shot up into the sky then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home late one night from a football game out of town, by the time.I was headed home it was near two o'clock. as we hust turned on to hwy 165 from the four way stop by hwy 61 i looked to the right and saw a ball of light that was white in the middle and orange around it. it stayed the right above the tree tops and kept the exact speed as the car (55mph) and it never made a sound. as we came to closer to a heavier populated area on dorchester road, as soon as we could see the light pollution in the sky the light/orb made a complete and perfect 90�� angle and shot straight up into the sky until it went so high up i couldn't see it anymore and that only took about 6 seconds.
content.summary: Hovered over treetops for a little bit then when came to light pollution made complete 90 degree angle up until it went out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
This has nothing to do with ufo sighting
to inform you of my background i'm from utah (not lds), and i'm a young female. weird stuff has happened my whole life, from having my mom tell me stories of me waiting on the front porch for my "friends" to my baby sitter having to quit because i'd wake up from dead sleep screaming in terror. i had really bad separation anxiety from my mom and was too scared to even go to the bathroom alone. 
from the time i can remember i have had these vivid dreams or my doc says "night terrors". this happens once a month but not on an exact date, i'm in my bed (or wherever i am, couch, friends, etc.) but i am usually alone or if i'm not the person i'm with is dead asleep. i'm on my phone or just laying there when all of a sudden i'm paralyzed, i cannot move except for my eyes the door opens (if i'm in my room, which i have only not been maybe 2 times) the door opens slowly, 3 beings come into the room and stare at me, they are tall maybe 8 feet and very slim and grey huge eyes that are so scary. i can't look at them because it is very terrifying, so i look away or close my eyes but i can feel them looking at me. then i wake up the next morning. that is it i don't have a dream or anything, but my door is always shut and there has been a couple times where i have woken up naked.
i am exhausted contstantly, and after it happens i have the urge to chug pickle juice. i have a big bruise above my tailbone thats been there my whole life, and random ringing in my ears. i also have tons of pain in my hips that they can't figure out why. some people i've talked to suggest i do hypnotherepy but i'm not sure i want to know what happens.
content.summary: No ufo-just weird experiences

content.detailedDescription:
11:44 pm sunday june 1st 2014.
i live in vic west/esquimalt, victoria bc.

i went outside to star gaze toward the south for a few minutes before retiring.
immediately saw a very bright star, then noticed movement so thought it was a satellite. i watched and noticed the brightness was 5x brighter than any star. (clear night)
the bright white light remained constant which surprised me as i thought it may have been a satellite or space station catching the sun and that the light/reflection should fade soon. it did not fade. 

the bright object moved from the south west to east-north-east (slightly more north than straight east.) i watched it move from approximately one mile south of the esquimalt base to the far west, past clover point and towards vancouver. the object seemed to be higher than a commercial airliner, (maybe 40,000ft?)remained a steady bright white light, moved steadily across my view in a straight line. my guess is that it was huge since i perceived it higher than 30,000 ft. and the size of an aspirin held at arm's length.
strange that it did not lose its brightness like a satellite moving past the sun's light. strange that there were no other lights, no flashing, just very steady bright white. also, no sound at all. a very quiet night, no wind, silent. i watched it's flight for about 35 seconds which is when it went past my field of vision.    

as i began to wonder what i was witnessing, my gut tightened and i felt a surprising twinge of anxiety. - did not expect this! now one hour later and the feeling of mild panic has shifted to a slight uneasiness. but feeling 98% okay.

i thought of taking a picture with my i-phone but believed the photo would just be a speck by the time i returned from the house.- so i didn't bother. (and i was distracted by my uneasiness.)
content.summary: Steady brightness, 5x brighter than brightest star, first witnessed approx one mile south of esquimalt base. watched for 30 sec. seemed higher than commercial airlines and therfore very big!

content.detailedDescription: I was standing beside a chair i was sitting at previously outside a little after midnight, when i heard a sound of a lawn mower, but at a higher pitch, which seemingly came from the sky above me. i scanned the sky, and seconds later the object came into view. the lights were in a star-like formation, a green light positioned at the front and five other red lights positioned like a five pointed star.  it moved in a direct and stable straight-line, never changing course or stopping abruptly. it was unknown to me, as i had seen many planes that night that looked nothing of it, and the  distance to the ground comparative to a plane seemed to be a few thousand feet. the lights appeared to be brighter and larger than that of a plane, which may be relative to the distance to the ground. i saw it for what seemed to be about ten seconds maximum, before it  was behind a neighboring tree, i quickly walked to the side to catch a better view of, but it had disappeared. i wasn't necessarily frightened, more intrigued, but very unsure of what i may have seen.
content.summary: I heard what sounded like a lawn mower, seconds later an unexplained object flew across the sky in a starlike formation.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok i had three encounters at three diffrent places at three diffrent times i first saw this glowing object i was on the bluffs it wasnt to far up it was night time clear sky the stars was out by the way but im not sure how to explain it it was like first i knew to look up then i knew that there was somthing odd about what at first i thought to be a star but right away knew it wasnt its color was a little diffrent from a normal star then it started moving i was standing not far from a scoope i was look despratly for some change to put in the scope but guess what i had no change so i wasnt able to get a good look and it started following me for a little bit after walking away eyes still locked on it as im looking at the craft i saw it vanish like some one diming the lights and was left with a pitch black object then immediately lost track of where it went(1) 
(2) the second encounter was short but unmistakable that it was the same star craft i was in my car and seen it by cold stones ice cream place did the same thing came out of no where and vanish (3) the final encounter the picture you see was finally one i was able to capture  i was  at home i went outside i felt like i knew where this thing was going to appear it was 5am and i was walking near the bike trail and there it was hovering right over some houses i tryed following it best i could took a picture and right after it once again turned its lights of and the only thing i was able to see was a pitch black object
content.summary: This object appears out of no where hovers then cuts its lights of and vanish

content.detailedDescription: Ilive in buffalo n.Y. i was sitting on my upstairs porch and i looked between the houses across the street i noticed a cylinder shape object reflecting bright light light it had a tail also lit i stared for about half an hour went inside for an hour or so went back out the cylinder was still there but next to it were three exhaust clouds like an airplane couldnt be an airplane they dont stand still and take off into nowhere no noise just smoke. i keep checking every night, have seen nothing but stars my sisterin law saws im crazy <i know what i seen and its not crazy thank you so much for listening mr. andrew l devito, 64yrs old and sane
content.summary: Large cylinder shaped object
